announcements.message: New course on AI-assisted simulation coming soon
Past lecture recordings available for CFD

courses.title: Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD)
courses.description: Introduction to finite volume methods, Navier-Stokes solvers, and advanced simulation of incompressible flow. Includes hands-on coding assignments and a final research mini-project.

courses.title: Multiphysics Modeling with LBM
courses.description: Covers immersed boundary and lattice Boltzmann methods for simulating complex fluid-structure interactions in biological and mechanical systems.

courses.title: Machine Learning for Simulation
courses.description: Learn how neural networks and surrogate models are applied to reduce computational cost in high-fidelity simulation tasks.
